title: The Honey Bee
description: Honey bees are social insects that live in colonies and are famous for their production of honey and beeswax. They play a crucial role in pollination and agriculture worldwide.

questions.question: How many eyes does a honey bee have?
What is the primary purpose of the honey bee's 'waggle dance'?
options: To communicate the location of food sources
questions.correct_answer: To communicate the location of food sources

questions.question: Which type of bee is responsible for laying eggs in a honey bee colony?
How far can a honey bee fly from the hive to forage?
What substance do honey bees produce to feed their young?
